item.title: Mentioned by insideTORONTO.com
item.description:
MP Peggy Nash a Station 423 firefighter for a day
Parkdale-High Park MP Peggy Nash joked she may have a new career in her future – as a firefighter. Nash spent the day on Aug. 10 with the Toronto Fire Services at Station 423 at Keele Street and Dundas Street West in the Junction. She said it was ...
